message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm asking for $110 for it. Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90
Bob, I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down to $105. This is still a great deal for you, and it's the lowest I can go at this point.
I'm still interested, but I think we can do better than that. I'm willing to pay $95
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. How about we split the difference? I'll go down to $100 for you. This is a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to work with me, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $92
